text:
Kleiner Perkins | Engineer in Residence | San Francisco, CA | Full-time

Kleiner Perkins, the VC firm behind many of the biggest startups in Silicon Valley, is looking for an Engineer in Residence to help build internal web apps and data pipelines. The role is a one or two year commitment best suited for Senior Software Engineers who plan to go on to build their own company or for those looking to join one of our fast-growing portfolio companies.

More details: http://bit.ly/2EuTkDS
